code: /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ /* eslint-disable no-script-url */import'./Sidebar.css';import{getStorage,ref,listAll,getDownloadURL}from"firebase/storage";import{locationChecker}from'./Location';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Sidebar(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ion-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"popup",className:"sidebar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"controls_row",className:"vertical_div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"javascript:void(0);",className:"closebtn",onClick:function onClick(){document.getElementById("popup").style.height="0";},children:"\xD7"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"location_info_row",className:"vertical_div"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"legacy_photo_row",className:"vertical_div"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"user_photo_row",className:"vertical_div"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"cameraButton",className:"cameraButton",onClick:function onClick(){locationChecker();},children:"Camera"})]})});}function getHistoricalImage(image){var historicalImage=document.getElementById("historicalImage");historicalImage.src=image;}function retrieveCapturedImage(index){var user_photo_div=document.getElementById("user_photo_row");var storage=getStorage();var storageRef=ref(storage,"rowid".concat(index,"/"));listAll(storageRef).then(function(res){res.items.forEach(function(imageRef){getDownloadURL(imageRef).then(function(url){var retrievedImage=document.createElement('img');retrievedImage.id="thumb_image";retrievedImage.src=url;user_photo_div.appendChild(retrievedImage);});});});}export{Sidebar,getHistoricalImage,retrieveCapturedImage};
